title: SURX - Leage of Legends - Lucian compilation

embed.description: me playing as lucian in leage of legends The music was provided by NCS Codeko - Crest [NCS Release] https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q1jqaK49SgU Lucian wields relic weapons imbued with ancient power and stands a stalwart guardian against the undead. His cold conviction never wavers, even in the face of the maddening horrors he destroys beneath his hail of purifying fire.
